blogPost.excerpt: Inbox Flows is a huge and growing library of emails from top brands that helps you research competitors and trends in your industry so you have a better idea of how to stand out in inboxes.
blogPost.body: Inbox Flows is a huge and growing library of emails from top brands that helps you research competitors and trends in your industry so you have a better idea of how to stand out in inboxes.
blogPost.title: Inbox Flows - Research and compare emails from top brands & competitors
blogPost.author: Ramy

localize.description: 收件箱流量是一个庞大且不断增长的顶级品牌邮件库，它可以帮助您研究行业内的竞争对手和趋势，让您更清楚如何在收件箱中脱颖而出。
localize.tagline: 研究和比较来自顶级品牌和竞争对手的电子邮件。

localize.description: 收件箱流量是一個龐大且不斷增長的頂級品牌郵件庫，它可以幫助您研究行業內的競爭對手和趨勢，讓您更清楚如何在收件箱中脫穎而出。
localize.tagline: 研究和比較來自頂級品牌和競爭對手的電子郵件。

previous.excerpt: 100% of your meals show up via delivery service. They perfectly meet your macro and calorie targets. Rank your performance, hunger, and enjoyment and the service gets smarter. Save at least 3.5 hours per week. For most people, it saves 5+ hours per week.
previous.title: Clockwork Nutrition - Perfect nutrition. Hot meals delivered. 100% automated.

localize.description: 您的餐点100%通过快递服务出现。它们完美地满足您的宏观和卡路里目标。对您的表现、饥饿感和享受进行排名，服务会变得更加智能。每周至少节省3.5小时。对于大多数人来说，每周可以节省5个小时以上。
localize.tagline: 完美的营养。热腾腾的饭菜送来。100%自动化。

localize.description: 您的餐點100%通過快遞服務出現。它們完美地滿足您的宏觀和卡路里目標。對您的表現、飢餓感和享受進行排名，服務會變得更加智能。每週至少節省3.5小時。對於大多數人來說，每週可以節省5個小時以上。
localize.tagline: 完美的營養。熱騰騰的飯菜送來。100%自動化。
